# Gait

> Offline-first, default-safe CLI for controllable and debuggable production AI agent runs.

## Canonical
- https://github.com/davidahmann/gait
- https://davidahmann.github.io/gait/

## Core Commands
- gait demo
- gait demo --durable
- gait demo --policy
- gait tour
- gait verify <run_id|path>
- gait regress init --from <run_id|path>
- gait regress run --json --junit <path>
- gait policy test <policy.yaml> <intent.json>
- gait gate eval --policy <policy.yaml> --intent <intent.json>
- gait doctor --json

## Safety Model
- Fail-closed in high-risk modes.
- Offline verification for runpacks and traces.
- Structured intent policy evaluation (not free-form prompt filtering).

## LLM Resources
- /llm/product.md
- /llm/quickstart.md
- /llm/security.md
- /llm/faq.md
- /llm/contracts.md
